00043 /// @brief     Creation of md5sum an object
00044 /// @return    an md5sum
00045 affx::md5sum::md5sum() {
00046   init();

00049 /// @brief     Init the starting state of the MD5 operation
00050 /// @return    non-zero on error
00051 int
00052 affx::md5sum::init()
00053 {
00054   MD5Init(&m_context);
00055   return 0;
00056 }
00057 
00058 /// @brief     update the MD5 state with a block of data
00059 /// @param     buf        Pointer to buffer of data
00060 /// @param     buf_size  Number of bytes in the buffer
00061 /// @return    non-zero on error
00062 int
00063 affx::md5sum::update(void* buf,uint32_t buf_size)
00064 {
00065   MD5Update(&m_context,(const u_int8_t*)buf,buf_size);
00066   return 0;
00067 }
00068 
00069 /// @brief     update the MD5 state with a string
00070 /// @param     str       String to add to the MD5
00071 /// @return    non-zero on error
00072 int
00073 affx::md5sum::update(const std::string& str)
00074 {
00075   MD5Update(&m_context,(const u_int8_t*)str.c_str(),(u_int32_t)str.size());
00076   return 0;
00077 }
00078 int
00079 affx::md5sum::update(char const * const str)
00080 {
00081   MD5Update(&m_context,(const u_int8_t*)str,(u_int32_t)strlen(str));
00082   return 0;
00083 }

00085 /// @brief     update the MD5 state with a int in network byte order.
00086 /// @param     val       Value to update the md5 with.
00087 /// @return    non-zero on error
00088 int affx::md5sum::update_nbo(int32_t val)
00089 {
00090   uint32_t val_bigendian=htonl((uint32_t)val);
00091   MD5Update(&m_context,(uint8_t*)&val_bigendian,sizeof(uint32_t));
00092   return 0;
00093 }
00094

00100   uint32_t val_bigendian=htonl(val);
00101   MD5Update(&m_context,(uint8_t*)&val_bigendian,sizeof(uint32_t));
00102   return 0;

00112   return 0;

00115 /// @brief     update the MD5 state with a int in network byte order.
00116 /// @param     val       Value to update the md5 with.
00117 /// @return    non-zero on error
00118 int affx::md5sum::update_nbo(uint8_t val)
00119 {
00120   // single byte, no swap needed.
00121   MD5Update(&m_context,(uint8_t*)&val,sizeof(uint8_t));
00122   return 0;
00123 }
00124 
00125 /// @brief     Update the md5 with all the values of the vector
00126 /// @param     vec   vector of ints to add to the checksum.
00127 /// @return    
00128 int affx::md5sum::update_nbo(const std::vector<int>& vec)
00129 {
00130   for (int i=0;i<vec.size();i++) {
00131     update_nbo(vec[i]);
00132   }
00133 
00134   return 0;
00135 }

00139  *
00140 /// @brief     update the MD5 state with a int in network byte order.

00150 /// @brief     update the MD5 state with a int in network byte order.
00151 /// @param     val       Value to update the md5 with.
00152 /// @return    non-zero on error
00153 int affx::md5sum::update_nbo(double val)
00154 {
00155   uint16_t val_bigendian=htons(val);
00156   MD5Update(&m_context,&val_bigendian,sizeof(uint16_t));
00157   return 0;
00158 }
00159 */
00160 
00161 /// append a nibble to a string
00162 #define MD5SUM_NIB_APPEND(str,nib) \
00163 { \
00164 int n=nib; \
00165 char c=(n<10)?('0'+n):('a'+n-10); \
00166 str.append(1,c); \
00167 }
00168 
00169 /// @brief     Conclude the computation of the MD5 and generate the output
00170 /// @param     sum       The hex-encoded MD5 output
00171 /// @return    non-zero on error
00172 int
00173 affx::md5sum::final(std::string& sum)
00174 {
00175   u_int8_t sum_bits[MD5_DIGEST_LENGTH];
00176   MD5Final(sum_bits,&m_context);
00177 
00178   // convert all the bits to hex
00179   sum="";
00180   sum.reserve(MD5_DIGEST_LENGTH*2); // "*2" for hex encoding
00181 
00182   for (int b=0;b<MD5_DIGEST_LENGTH;b++) {
00183     int bits=sum_bits[b];
00184     MD5SUM_NIB_APPEND(sum,bits>>4);
00185     MD5SUM_NIB_APPEND(sum,bits&0x0f);
00186   }
00187 
00188   // prepare for the next round
00189   init();
00190   return 0;
00191 }
00192

00194 
00195 /// @brief     Compute the MD5 of a std::string
00196 /// @param     str       string to checksum
00197 /// @param     sum       output checksum
00198 /// @return    non-zero on error
00199 int
00200 affx::md5sum::ofString(std::string str,std::string& sum)
00201 {
00202   init();
00203   update(str);
00204   return final(sum);
00205 }
00206 
00207 /// @brief     Compute the MD5 of a file
00208 /// @param     filename  name of the file to
00209 /// @param     sum
00210 /// @return    non-zero on error
00211 int
00212 affx::md5sum::ofFile(const std::string filename,std::string& sum, const std::string& salt)
00213 {
00214   ifstream istm;
00215   char* buf_ptr;
00216   int buf_size=(1<<12); // 4MB
00217 
00218   // clear the output now in case of an error later.
00219   sum="";
00220   init();
00221 
00222   buf_ptr=new char[buf_size];
00223   assert(buf_ptr!=NULL);
00224 
00225   std::string uncfilename=Fs::convertToUncPath(filename);
00226 
00227   //istm.exceptions(ios_base::bad_bit|ios_base::fail_bit);
00228   istm.open(uncfilename.c_str(),ios_base::binary);
00229 
00230   if (istm.fail()) {
00231     delete[] buf_ptr;
00232     return -1;
00233   }
00234 
00235   if (salt.empty() == false) {
00236     update(salt);
00237   }
00238 
00239   do {
00240     istm.read(buf_ptr,buf_size);
00241     update(buf_ptr,(int)istm.gcount());
00242   } while (!istm.eof());
00243 
00244   delete[] buf_ptr;
00245   istm.close();
00246 
00247   return final(sum);
00248 }
